title: Post-Quantum Cryptography and Quantum-Safe Security: A Comprehensive Survey
focus: Comprehensive survey of PQC from foundations to deployment, including ML-KEM, ML-DSA, SLH-DSA, TLS integration, PKI, and hybrid migration strategies

title: AmphiKey: A Dual-Mode Secure Authenticated Key Encapsulation Protocol for Smart Grid
focus: Hybrid ML-KEM-768/X25519 authenticated key exchange with handshake latency measurements
key_metrics: Handshake latency: 0.15 ms (server, deniable mode), 0.41 ms (Raspberry Pi, deniable mode)
Authenticated mode: 4.8 ms (client signature), 0.84 ms (server verify)

title: Analysis of Post-Quantum Cryptography in User Equipment in 5G and Beyond
focus: PQC performance evaluation in 5G user equipment using NIST algorithms, TLS 1.3 with BoringSSL and liboqs
key_metrics: ML-KEM + ML-DSA: Best efficiency for latency-sensitive applications
SPHINCS+ and HQC: Higher computational/transmission overhead
Handshake latency analysis under varying network conditions

title: Quantum-Resistant Domain Name System: A Comprehensive System-Level Study
focus: Post-quantum DNS security across DNSSEC, DoT, and DoH using OQS libraries and BIND9
key_metrics: ML-KEM and Falcon offer practical latency/resource profiles
SPHINCS+ significantly increases message sizes and overhead

title: Faster Post-Quantum TLS 1.3 Based on ML-KEM: Implementation and Assessment
focus: ML-KEM optimization using AVX-512, TLS 1.3 handshake performance improvements

title: Quantum-Safe integration of TLS in SDN networks
focus: Hybrid classical/quantum/PQC in TLS 1.3 for SDN with QKD integration and rekeying

title: A Quantum of QUIC: Dissecting Cryptography with Post-Quantum Insights
focus: QUIC handshake performance with PQC (Kyber, Dilithium, FALCON, SPHINCS+)
key_metrics: 10-20% performance increase when removing packet protection
Kyber, Dilithium, FALCON: Low handshake impact
Evaluation of LSQUIC, quiche, MsQuic implementations

title: Fingerprinting Implementations of Cryptographic Primitives and Protocols that Use Post-Quantum Algorithms
focus: Fingerprinting attacks on PQC implementations in TLS, SSH, QUIC, OpenVPN, OIDC

title: OptHQC: Optimize HQC for High-Performance Post-Quantum Cryptography
focus: HQC code-based PQC optimization for high-performance cryptographic operations
key_metrics: Optimized syndrome computation and error recovery

title: Quantum Disruption: An SOK of How Post-Quantum Attackers Reshape Blockchain Security and Performance
focus: Systemization of knowledge on post-quantum threats to blockchain and PQC migration strategies
key_metrics: Performance impact of PQC on blockchain systems
